attributes.action: Give care workers The Humanitarian Medal for the work they did during Covid
attributes.additional_details: Care workers work very hard and under challenging environments and don’t get as much credit or recognition as much as they should do so to thank them for there service during COVID I think they should be awarded The Humanitarian Medal as a thank you from everyone in the country for looking after our elderly and veterans during a scary and difficult time. Not only did they work though COVID but they also put their own health at risk in doing so.
attributes.background: Give all care workers that work during COVID The Humanitarian Medal for looking after our elderly and putting there own health at risk in doing so.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that ask for a person or a group of people to be given an honour, or have an honour taken away.
